articles.description: To launch the 2022 Yamaha NEO's electric scooter, Yamaha Europe launched an ad that made some extremely strange and uncomfortable choices. What do you think?
articles.content: Getting your new scooter into the hearts and minds of potential riders cant be easyespecially with relatively new technology. In March, 2022, Yamaha Europe officially launched the NEOs, its first ele… [+4466 chars]
